desc: Marketplace App for beauty marketThis beauty marketplace app is meant to be used by the beauty market liberal professionals that can work under demand, go to the client's place (such as work, house, etc) or they can attend appointments in their own place of work, as well. On the other end, it is meant to be used by the clients that have no time to make appointments in beauty centers. This app is been developed by an industry that sells products to clients and professionals. In addition, this industry provides classes to professionals that want to enter the beauty market or that are already in the market but want to qualify. Therefore, in the administrator dashboard, there is a need to be able to input this products and classes for sale. In this first moment, there will not be needed to provide classes online, only selling the existing classroom lessons that the industry provides.Business Model:The business model is based on a fixed amount that these service providers need to pay the administrator for each client that they attend successfully through the app. In addition, the administrator will be able to sell products and classes to clients and service providers.Where it will work:This App is been required by a Brazilian beauty industry, so it will work in Brazilians most popular cities. It will start working in one particular city, and naturally, it will grow to other places in Brazil.Required development:•	Clients Apps (iOS and Android)•	Beauty service providers Apps (iOS and Android)•	Administrator Dashboard•	App landing pageRequisitions:•	Previous and solid experience on App development/design (portfolio requested)•	Team communication and full report through Asana•	Design development team up with our team through Zeplin•	Full Testing in and report in all phases of the project•	Aws servers full hosting of project (client’s account)•	Payment Gateway setup (client’s choice and account)•	Sms confirmation server setup (client’s choice and account)•	Https certification, secure base of all clients and service providers data.We will provide:•	All development documentation•	Full documentation on testing prototypes•	Punctual designs, such as icons or specified demands•	All legal documentation that should be inputted in the app and landing page•	Marketing strategy•	Branding Strategy•	Other items that will be needed along the projectDeadline:2 regular months (60 calendar days or the same as about 40 working days) to fully develop the project.Payment for development:•	30% upfront•	30% in full working prototype (included payment gateway)•	40% by the end of the projectHow it will be paid:Payment must be through freelancer, using this accounts credit cards and PayPal.
title: Marketplace App for beauty market

desc: PROJECT INTRODUCTIONEyeLoveBirds is an app that helps users to identify birds in their area. The app consists of lists of birds, each list including all species that exist within a certain park, city or country. Ie Central Park (New York) or Madagascar. Each species has a full profile that includes information on appearance, behaviour and location as well as photos and sounds.Version 2.3.0 of the app is available for free in the iOS App Store now. Please download it and explore the current feature set to get familiar.[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]SCOPE OF WORKDeliver EyeLoveBirds Version 3.0.0 that will allow users to track and manage their bird sightings. includes the following:- Create native iOS Autolayout UI Storyboards based screens- Integration with Google Firebase Realtime Database ([url removed, login to view])- Integration with Google Firebase Authentication ([url removed, login to view])- Integration with Google FirebaseUI for iOS ([url removed, login to view])- Only skilled iOS developers should reply starting their message with “grey-cheeked tit babbler”- More detailed overview of the 3.0 feature set can be viewed here or attached to this job posting [url removed, login to view]and [url removed, login to view]WHAT YOU WILL DO- Be an experienced native iOS developer with a portfolio of past projects to share- Your primary focus will be taking designs, specifications and user stories and bringing them to reality- We will deliver full fidelity mockups (PSD and AI files) and clickable prototypes using Tapcase- You will be working alongside the two founders who work professionally full time as a Technical Director and UX / UI Architectt.- Architect and implement solutions using Objective-C and Swift in an existing native Objective-C based iOS application- Integrate with iOS / Apple ecosystem services- Provide clear and well written pull requests via Bitbucket for code review- Communicate on project deliverables via Asana project management software- Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs- Maintain and improve code quality and organization- Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of the applicationSKILLS AND EXPERIENCE- Proficient with Objective-C and Cocoa Touch- Extremely proficient and experienced with Storyboards, UIKit and multi-device Autolayout- Understanding of Apple’s design principles and interface guidelines- Proficient with iOS frameworks: CoreData, CoreLocation, MapKit, and UIKit.- Proficient understanding of Git and related tools like GitHub, Bitbucket, Git-LFS, Gitflow / Forking workflows, etc- Experience with cocoapods and / or Carthage- Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning- Experience with cloud message APIs and push notifications- Familiarity with performance and memory tuning with tools (such as Instruments)- Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end servicesBonus Skills and experience:- Experience using Google Firebase
title: Write an iPhone application

desc: Andrey Pustovoy sent the offerLooking for a developer/studio to build an Android and iOS mobile app that would scan USA license plates on the parked cars through smartphone's camera, then extract the plate number as text (OCR), then upload it to a cloud database. Along with the license plate number the app will need to send the GPS location, timestamp and image, plus record if license plate number was entered manually. Aslo the app will need to send the GPS location in real time while user is logged in, so movement of the user's smartphone can be tracked in real time by admin. Login/Log out times and GPS locations must be also captured.Backend:Backend must be a web portal with the following components:- Admin Login- Ability to manage users and admins (add/delete/edit profile/change password)- View logged in users--- Must be able to see logged in user movement on the map in a real time, along with the path made during the logged in period. Login/logoff  points and points where the scans were taken must be marked as well.- View user sessions history- View license plate scans historyminimal bootstrap design is fineWireframes are attached.App: [url removed, login to view]Backend: [url removed, login to view]
